item.title: In the Matter of: Canyon Plastics, Inc.
item.description:
Public Notice

Public Notice: Canyon Plastics, Inc. Proposed Settlement  

Documents Related to a Proposed Settlement of Clean Water Act Class II Administrative Penalty In the Matter of Canyon Plastics, Inc.

Docket No. CWA-09-2017-0001

  • CAFO: Canyon Plastics, Inc., Valencia, California (PDF)(16 pp, 174 K, 11/30/2016)
    Complaint/Consent Agreement and [Proposed] Final Order in the matter of Canyon Plastics, Inc., Valencia, California
  • Supplemental Environmental Project (SEP): Canyon Plastics, Inc. (PDF)(31 pp, 1 MB, 07/22/2016)
    Supplemental Environmental Project (SEP) Recycling Plastic Tails and Scrap at Canyon Plastics, Inc. Submitted to U.S. EPA, Region 9

item.title: Draft NPDES Permit and 301(h) Waiver: City of San Diego E.W. Blom Point Loma Wastewater Treatment Plant
item.description:
Documents related to the City of San Diego E.W. Blom Point Loma Wastewater Treatment Plant Joint EPA and State NPDES Permit and Waiver From Secondary Treatment.

  • Tentative Order No. R9-2017-0007 and Draft NPDES Permit No. CA0107409 (PDF)(178 pp, 2 MB, 10/28/2016)
    Tentative Order and Draft Permit for the City of San Diego’s E.W. Blom Point Loma Metropolitan Wastewater Treatment Plant and Ocean Outfall Draft Modified NPDES Permit.
  • Draft 301(h) Waiver: City of San Diego’s E. W. Blom Point Loma Metropolitan Wastewater Treatment Plant (PDF)(161 pp, 4 MB, 10/28/2016)
    Draft 301(h) Waiver for the City of San Diego’s E. W. Blom Point Loma Metropolitan Wastewater Treatment Plantand Ocean Outfall Application for a Modified NPDES Permit Under Sections 301(h) and (j)(5) of the Clean Water Act.
  • Joint Public Notice of Proposed Actions and Public Hearing: Public Order No. 2939246 (PDF)(2 pp, 95 K, 10/28/2016)
    EPA Region IX and California Regional Water Quality Control Board, San Diego are jointly releasing for public review and comment Tentative Order No. R9-2017-0007 (NPDES Permit No. CA0107409), Waste Discharge Requirements and National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Permit for the City of San Diego E.W. Blom Point Loma Wastewater Treatment Plant Discharge to the Pacific Ocean through the Point Loma Ocean Outfall.
item.dc:creator: dschwe01

item.title: City of El Monte Stormwater System Improvement Project FONSI and EA
item.description:
The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Region 9 intends to award a grant to the City of El Monte, California, in accordance with the in accordance with the Consolidated Appropriations Act of FY2009 for the Garvey Storm Drain Reconstruction Project. EPA Region 9 has prepared an Environmental Assessment (EA) describing the potential environmental impacts associated with, and the alternatives to, the proposed project. The Finding of No Significant Impact (FONSI) documents EPA Region 9’s decision that the proposed project will not have a significant effect on the environment.

  • Public Notice: City of El Monte Stormwater System Improvement Project (PDF)(1 pg, 28 K, November 2016)
    The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Region 9 intends to award a grant to the City of El Monte in accordance with the in accordance with the Consolidated Appropriations Act of FY2009 for the Garvey Storm Drain Reconstruction Project.
  • EPA Finding of No Significant Impact for the City of El Monte Stormwater System Improvement Project, Los Angeles County, California (PDF)(3 pp, 49 K, November 2016)
    This finding of no significant impact (FONSI) documents EPA Region 9’s decision that the proposed project will not have a significant effect on the environment.
  • EPA Environmental Assessment: City of El Monte, CA., Garvey Avenue Stormwater System Improvement Project (PDF)(174 pp, 40 MB, November 2016)
    EPA Environmental Assessment for the City of El Monte, CA., Garvey Avenue Stormwater System Improvement Project.
item.dc:creator: dschwe01
